CatDescriptText: image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 10, 1962, pg. 24 reads: "Hawk, Stands High - Connie Hawkins, star center with the Pittsburgh Rens basketball team, has his carnation pinned on by Fritz Campbell, Pittsburgh Pirates' ticket-seller. Hawkins was one of the honored guests at the Dapper Dan banquet...-All Photos by Harris"
TitMainTitle: Pittsburgh Rens basketball player Connie Hawkins, holding program for 26th annual Dapper Dan event, getting carnation pinned to lapel by Fritz Campbell, Pittsburgh Pirates' ticket-seller, in Kings Garden, Hilton Hotel
